Name: Apricot Rickey
Ingredients: 30 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Fizz or Highball (8oz to 10oz) glass .
Prepare garnish of length of lime peel.
Review: Light, fruity and refreshing, if a little on the sweet side.
Nutrition: One serving of Apricot Rickey contains 134 calories
